Title: Ben Roethlisberger's agent: Steelers 'want Ben back'
Description: All signs point to ﻿ Ben Roethlisberger ﻿ being back as the Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback in the 2021 season. Roethlisberger will need to restructure his deal for the cap-strapped Steelers, but his agent Ryan Tollner told NFL Network's Aditi Kinkhabwala that the team wants him back and conversations are forthcoming on working out a contract adjustment.
Author: NFL
